title: "What are the techniques for magnetism, self-hypnosis, and weight loss in hypnotherapy?"
first_phrase: This text presents various techniques related to hypnosis, particularly for weight loss and self-hypnosis. The text also covers different levels of moving therapy and the use of music to create a release state. The author presents various exercises that help with magnetic voice and hypnodrama, along with fluidification for preparing the client for magnetism. Furthermore, the text also explores sounds and metacommunicational codes in therapy, introducing strong somnambulism and the use of tests to stimulate unconscious answers. This section ends with an explanation of the different magnetic types and how to work with them effectively.
